About The Millionaire Agent Mindset

Joshua Stern leads Utah’s #1 Residential Resale team with over 2,000 sales in 15 years. Joshua’s Promise for service excellence for his clients and focus on the “client experience” has lead his team to receiving hundreds of referrals a year. Joshua’s Strategic Sales Systems has caused his team to continue to be at the top in terms of units sold per year, and client satisfaction.

Joshua now focuses his energy on his team “helping them to achieve their own greatness potential” through world class leadership, training and sales systems. Joshua is a MAPS coach, and as such, coaches many of the top real estate teams in the world.

Joshua Stern
Keller Williams MAPS Coach
